verbs.description: [ARG0: hannaford] [V: recalls] [ARG1: some prepared foods for salmonella risk] hannaford recalled a store - brand rotini salad for possible bacterial contamination on thursday just days after also recalling another pasta casserole and two types of frozen pizzas for the same reason hannaford capital region salmonella
